1.0.1.en: Added Time-Of-Use where you specify StartTime and Hours instead of EndTime. Specify Hours from StartTime instead of EndTime.

1.0.2.en: A lot of capabilities added and more configuration.

1.0.5.en: New capabilities added (from/to battery). More conditions added.

1.1.2.en: Added support for start-as-string. Packages update.

1.2.4.en: Hotfix. Commands not being sent. Added settings on device.

1.2.5.en: Added DE translations for v1.2.4. Fixes IP change auto-recovery. Fixes homeBattery device config.
